32#include "vi.h"

34/*
35 * v_zexit -- ZZ
36 * Save the file and exit.
37 *
38 * PUBLIC: int v_zexit __P((SCR *, VICMD *));
39 */
40int
41v_zexit(SCR *sp, VICMD *vp)
42{
43 /* Write back any modifications. */
44 if (F_ISSET(sp->ep, F_MODIFIED) &&
45 file_write(sp, NULL, NULL, NULL, FS_ALL))
46 return (1);
47
48 /* Check to make sure it's not a temporary file. */
49 if (file_m3(sp, 0))
50 return (1);
51
52 /* Check for more files to edit. */
53 if (ex_ncheck(sp, 0))
54 return (1);
55
56 F_SET(sp, SC_EXIT);
57 return (0);
58}
